# capturedRoom(from:)

**Instance Method**

Processes the specified raw scan results and returns a detailed representation of the room.

## Declaration

```swift
func capturedRoom(from capturedRoomData: CapturedRoomData) async throws -> CapturedRoom
```

## Parameters

- **capturedRoomData**: A data object that contains raw scan results.

## Return Value

A captured-room object that provides the key details of a scanned room.

## Discussion

You retrieve the argument `capturedRoomData` in one of the following ways:

- The [doc://com.apple.RoomPlan/documentation/RoomPlan/RoomCaptureViewDelegate/captureView(shouldPresent:error:)] callback for an app that scans rooms using the framework-provided view ([doc://com.apple.RoomPlan/documentation/RoomPlan/RoomCaptureView]).
- The [doc://com.apple.RoomPlan/documentation/RoomPlan/RoomCaptureSessionDelegate/captureSession(_:didEndWith:error:)] callback for an app that implements its own room-scanning view.
title: capturedRoom(from:)
